original: dang po gdong pa'i gtsang sbra la sogs pa byas pa'i sgom pa pos rang gi snying gar yi ge aa las skyes pa'i zla ba la yi ge yi nag po rnam par bsgoms la //

original: de'i rjes la yi ge ram las nges par byung ba'i nyi ma la h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i dbyug to rang gi sa bon 'phro ba dang ldan pa rnams par bsgoms te /

analyzed: de'i dbus su @31b dbyangs kyi yi ge nyis 'gyur gyi rang bzhin zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par 'byung ba shes rab kyi ngo bo legs par blta bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par 'byung ba shes rab kyi ngo bo legs par blta bar bya ba'o //

original: de'i steng du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i rnam par dag pa da dha da dha ya la rnams nyis 'gyur dang bcas pa'i ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed rnams nyis 'gyur du byas pa yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhan yin te /

translated: Above that, the nature of the eighty minor marks is the other moon ma·πá·∏çala, which is the transformation of the double consonants, ka, and so on, together with the double dentals, da, dha, da, and dha, and the sibilants, sa, ·π£a, sa, and ha.

analyzed: thabs kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa 'od mtha' yas pa 'phro ba dang ldan par bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: One should meditate on the nature of method, which is endowed with the emission of infinite light.

original: de nas de gnyis ka yongs su rdzogs pa las nyi ma la h'um dang yam mthing nag las yang dag par byung ba'i char sprin gzhon nu dang mtshungs pa'i sku mdog mthing nag ste /

original: nyid kyi sku'i 'od zer gyis sprul pa'i khro bo lnga 'phro bar mdzad pa dang / gdengs ka can gyi rgyal po rgyan du mdzad pa /
